content: i lived in wisconsin for 20 years and the arcturus hooded scarf is something i wish i had during those cold wisconsin winters construction main body is a repeating single_crochet linen stitch border is crocheted directly to scarf body and the texture is created using a front post and back post crossing double_crochet stitches used bpdc - back post double_crochet chain - chain fpdc - front post double_crochet fsc - foundation single_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet repeat - repeat single_crochet - single_crochet scls - single_crochet linen stitch decrease - single_crochet two together slip_stitch - slip_stitch this pattern has not been tested with the exception of the sample i made for myself this is my first crochet pattern hope you love it
